Rohde Schwarz instrument drivers¶

class pyslave.drivers.rohdeschwarz.zvb.zvb(address)¶

Rohde&Schwarz Vector Network Analyzer (ZVA,ZVB) driver. All the functions from the rszvb DLL are available. See the DLL help in the ./__zvb__ directory.

Example : zvb.SetPower(channel=1, power=-10)

The channel keyword argument is set to 1 by default.

copy_sweep_parameters(dic, channel=1)¶

Copy the sweep parameters (see get_sweep_parameters) to the dictionary dic (e.g. hd5 attributes).

fetch(channel=1)¶

Retrieve data from the specified channel. Data are returned as a numpy two column vector.

freq(channel=1)¶

Get the start,stop frequency and number of points and generate the corresponding frequency vector.

get_sweep_parameters(channel=1)¶

Return the start,stop frequency and number of points for the specified channel.

wait_for_average(channel=1, sleep_time=0.1)¶

Broken function.
